formattedAddress: 5 E 98th St 14th Fl, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 5 E 98th St 14th Fl, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text:
Dr. Divino performed a right side Inguinal hernia repair and I am blown away by the results. I had a left side repair 20 years ago and I was very anxious about this procedure & my recovery; but I'm 2 weeks out from the procedure & I am basically back to full activity with no pain and only mild intermittent discomfort!!! The incision site and scar are tiny, and the office staff, the procedure prep, and the surgery itself were efficient, fast, and inspired confidence.

I've already recommended Dr. Divino to several people. Her work exceeded my wildest expectations, and I'm very grateful for her care and attention & expertise. üôè

originalText.text: Dr. Divino and her team did a very nice job in explaining options, steps prior to surgery and following pre-surgery. The operation was successful and he care at the hospital and post surgery was helpful.

originalText.text: Dr. Celia Divino is a very excellent surgeon, she explained the procedure so well in a comfortable manner, very compassionate at her job as well as the whole team works so well together‚Ä¶ over all I am very satisfied with the level of care she provided. Highly recommend Dr. Divino.

originalText.text:
I came to Dr. Celia Divino‚Äôs office as the result of some foods indigestion that got stuck on my internal pouch that causes severe cramps and diarrhea.  So I was ushered by her team into the examining room and after a few Q & A, Dr. Divino appeared into the room.

I find her very accommodating and reassuring - very straight to the point in her explanation about the problem I have and about the procedure I needed for my specific case. She said she‚Äôs a surgeon and not a G.I. which is the kind of medical doctor I needed to see. However, she‚Äôs the kind that one will feel better right away even without medical intervention from her. I‚Äôm very satisfied with her suggestion and advice - Very recommendable.

originalText.text: Excellent doctor, amazing team. I am so happy she was the one who performed my surgery. I‚Äôm happy with the result and to my surprise I didn‚Äôt have a lot pain after surgery. She is professional and did her job perfectly.
